General.Name: cbdMD Inc
General.Description: cbdMD, Inc. produces and distributes various cannabidiol (CBD) products in the United States. The company owns and operates consumer hemp-based CBD brands, such as cbdMD, Paw CBD, hempMD, and cbdMD Botanicals. Its cbdMD brand products include CDB tinctures, gummies, topicals, capsules, drink mixes, ready to drink cans, and sleep, focus, and calming aids. It also provides veterinarian-formulated products, including tinctures, chews, and topicals under the Paw CBD brand name; nootropic mushroom line under the ATRx brand; and hemp derived solutions under the hempMD brand. It distributes its products through its e-commerce website, third-party e-commerce sites, select distributors and marketing partners, wholesalers, and various brick and mortar retailers. The company was formerly known as Level Brands, Inc. and changed its name to cbdMD, Inc. in May 2019. cbdMD, Inc. is headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina.
General.Address: 2101 Westinghouse Blvd, Charlotte, NC, United States, 28273
